subtitles:
46588 50300 It can't rain all the time--
Can't rain all the time--

50384 56098 Can't rain all the time-- Can't rain
all the time-- Can't rain all the time--

61854 64439 I don't know how many times I gotta
tell you. We're in this together.

64523 68360 We ain't and one part falls
and it all falls.

68443 70654 - Do you know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

70779 73949 That piece of rat shit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll.

79454 83584 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

89214 94261 - No Funboy.
- Probably still bangin' away on Darla.

135677 139056 What the fuck are you
supposed to be, man?

157950 161954 What's all this happy horseshit?
Hey, T-Bird! T-Bird!

167376 170587 - Oh, shit.
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

181682 186061 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

187729 190607 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

200993 203370 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

214256 217050 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

222598 225601 This is vehicle 38.
We got us a big ol'red hot rod.

231648 236862 You got somethin' personal, amigo,
we can work it out, right? Huh?
254046 256256 Oh, man, get out of the way!

284868 288580 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

289998 292459 T-Bird, I got you, man!
I'm coming!

309476 311895 Remember? Yeah, I remember everything.
But I don't know--

311979 316191 What? What? Huh? What?
What are you talkin' about?

316275 320070 No, no, no, no, no.
You mean that place downtown?

320195 323198 Yeah, I remember her. We needed to
put some fear into that little lady.

323282 326285 She wasn't going along with
our tenant relocation programme.

326410 332332 Then her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear
into a total cluster fuck.

332416 335502 Who gives a shit?
It's ancient history.

335586 338797 What? What do you want?
What is it? What?
343635 347139 Did you send us these complaints?

353645 358025 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

360694 363030 But you ain't you.
You can't be you.

363113 366742 We put you through the window.
There ain't no comin' back.

366825 369995 This is the really real world.
There ain't no comin' back.

370078 372414 We killed you dead.
There ain't no comin' back.

377085 380047 There ain't no comin' back!
There ain't no comin' back!

387346 393268 ''Abashed the devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is.''
393352 396188 He felt how awful goodness is.

463255 465465 This is the 7.:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

465549 468093 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

468177 472264 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city-- Devil's Night...

472389 475851 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

475934 481231 Last year over 200
individual blazes were reported,
and 1 1 people lost their lives.

481315 486445 Tonight, on the eve
of what may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever...

486528 490157 the mayor has firefighters from all
surrounding counties as well as--

490282 494077 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

496121 498916 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

504379 508050 So what do you want now,
black coffee and cigarettes?

508133 512137 So what did you take
to become Mother of the Year?

512221 516642 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

522564 527778 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

530322 535327 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

559601 562271 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

562354 565524 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

565607 569778 - We're gonna have to I.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-Bird.

569862 573657 Arson was his specialty. Looks like
he zigged when he should have zagged.

586628 591258 I got a goddam vigilante killer
knockin' off scumbags left and right,
and you're covering up for somebody.

592843 595846 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

595929 598056 Hey, you're the detective.
Why don't you tell me?

598182 601310 Okay. Gideon's blows all to hell,
and you're having a chitchat
with some weirdo...

601393 604438 who winds up in T-Bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

604521 607065 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

607149 609484 and you're saying this is just
a fuckin' automobile accident?

609568 612154 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

612237 615991 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good. You know,
you gotta write that shit down.

616074 621163 All right, smart-ass. The captain's got
a little love note waiting for you.

621246 623749 Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.

683725 686395 - One for sorrow, two for joy...
- Come here.

686478 689314 and three for a girl
and four for a boy.
787454 791208 You said, ''Can't rain all the time.''
791291 793669 That is from your song, right?
804888 807599 Come on, Eric, I know you're here.
817317 819945 Gets so lonely all by myself.

823365 827828 The hell with you.
I thought you cared.

841425 844887 That's him. That's him!
But he looked different.

844970 847222 He was all painted up white
like some kind of dead whore.

847306 850350 I seen him. T-Bird, he sent me in
for some road beers, right?

850434 852978 Then he took him away.
But I chased him down.

853061 855939 And he flash-fried T-Bird
to his fuckin' car!

859568 863530 Maybe we oughta just videotape this,
play it back in slow motion.

864990 869912 - Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

869995 874791 - Empty.
- Fire it-- Grave? What grave?

874875 878212 - What about my fuckin' grave?
- Three out of four.
- Oh, man!

878337 881131 He's working his way
back to this speed freak right here.

883926 888222 That boy was out of control. T-Bird,
he came in, he says, ''Waste 'em both.''

888305 891642 And now this ghost
gonna kill my ass next!
894645 898524 This ghost gonna kill my ass next.

898649 901443 - This ghost gonna kill m--
- Hey.

905405 908992 - They have all arrived.
- Watch him.
927344 931765 He like his plain or with onions?

935060 939481 When someone's dead,
they can't come back, can they?

941942 944319 Are you referring
to anyone in particular?

946822 950659 Yeah, well, then maybe
they'll have to lock us both up.
956665 960085 Maybe it was your fairy godfather.
960210 962588 Eric didn't come back for me.

962713 968051 He can't be my friend any more
because I'm-- I'm alive.
968135 971597 You want a friend to walk you home?

1001043 1004046 I am the wicked
I am the wave of the future

1067985 1071196 It seems our friend T-Bird
won't be joining us this evening...
1071280 1074074 on account of a slight case of death.

1079454 1083792 Well, well, well.
Devil's Night is upon us again.

1083876 1089006 I thought we'd throw a little party,
start a bunch of fires,
make a little profit.

1093594 1098348 Problem is, it's all been done before.
You see what I'm sayin'?

1098432 1102394 - That's no reason to quit.
- Wrong.

1102477 1107232 Best reason to quit.
Only reason to quit.

1116700 1122122 The idea expands.
The idea becomes an institution.

1126251 1128712 See, that's what's
been bothering me, boys.

1128795 1131298 And I tell ya, when I used to think
about the idea itself...
1131381 1135511 it'd put a big old smile on my face.

1135594 1142309 You see, gentlemen,
greed is for amateurs.

1149149 1152361 - What about Devil's Night?
- What about it?

1152444 1155739 I started the first fires
in this goddam city.

1155822 1159034 Before I knew it, every charlatan
and shitheel was imitating me.
1159117 1162955 Do you know what they got now?

1172172 1178929 The idea has become the institution,
boys. Time to move along.

1179012 1181473 You don't want us to do
''Light My Fire'' time for the whole city?

1184017 1188272 No, I want you to set a fire so goddam
big, the gods'll notice us again.

1190274 1194027 I want all of you boys to be able
to look me straight in the eye
one more time and say...

1197155 1199950 - Hey, you! What's your name? Skank!
- Huh? What?

1200033 1203161 - You don't feel that?
- I feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.

1204705 1207082 ''I feel like a little worm
on a big fuckin' hook.''

1207207 1211503 Well, boy, your mama
must be damn proud of you.

1214423 1216633 How the hell'd that thing
get in here?
1221930 1225309 Let me go! Let me go! I gotta go!

1229855 1236695 So you're him, huh?
The avenger. The killer of killers.

1236778 1241909 Nice outfit.
Not sure about the face though.
1252044 1255672 I see you have made your decision.

1255756 1259510 - Now let's see you enforce it.
- Aw, this is already
boring the shit out of me.

1312688 1315649 Right here! H-Here, help me!
Help me! He's tryin' to kill me!

1428554 1431431 Guess it's not a good day
to be a bad guy, huh, Skank?

1431515 1437855 I'm not Skank.
There's Skank right there. Skank's dead.

1447739 1452828 - What in the crap--
- Don't move! Hold it!

1452911 1456373 That's all she wrote.
Move and we shoot!

1464256 1468343 You are surrounded by police units.
Do not attempt to escape.

1483192 1487988 Stop immediately.
Lie down, spread your arms and legs--

1542835 1545128 So many cops, you'd think
they were giving away doughnuts.
1556098 1558642 I knew you were going to do that.

1558725 1563856 Look at that out there. The whole
city oughta be in flames by now.

1566441 1570737 So that, I take it,
is the late, great Eric Draven.

1570821 1576535 He has power, but it is power
you can take from him.

1581707 1586545 between the land of the living
and the realm of the dead.

1586628 1591133 So kill the crow
and destroy the man.

1668043 1671964 You're gonna say
I shouldn't be in the cemetery
in the middle of the night. Right?

1672047 1676802 - The safest place in the world to be.
- That's 'cause everybody's dead.

1685769 1689815 You're just gonna have to
forgive me for that.
1700492 1703704 I gave this to Shelly once.
1707374 1710335 I think she'd like you to have it.
1714381 1717259 This way you'll always remember her.
1737863 1741325 I'd better go sneak back in the house.

1799883 1803345 What is that, some sort of souvenir
there from your pal?

1805389 1808016 I'll just keep it for good luck.
What do you say? Hmm?

1881590 1884968 Give me the girl,
and I'll let you walk out of here.

1887054 1891350 Well, well. Why don't you just give me
a minute to think about that, huh?

1920212 1923465 Well, well, well, it does seem to me
that our little life...

1923549 1926552 has undergone a rather significant
change in the past few minutes.

1932808 1936228 Well, for a ghost
you bleed just fine.

1939773 1942025 - It's still alive.
- Well, then kill it.

1992993 1997289 Well, I just came by
to pay my respects, and here you are
gettin' all shot up again.

2002544 2005506 - I can handle it. Don't worry.
- I'm not worried.

2005547 2009510 Look, here's the plan. You stay in
front, and when they run out of ammo,
I'll arrest 'em.

2009593 2013388 That sounds like a great plan.
There's just one problem.

2015724 2018936 Oh, shit.
You're bleedin' all over the place.

2019019 2021688 I thought, you know,
you were invincible.
2021772 2025192 I was. I'm not any more.

2026485 2030614 Well, I guess you really will
need my help, won't you? Come on.

2067317 2070737 - You were supposed to stay behind me.
- I think I messed up.

2094887 2100893 This is all the power you ever had.
Now it is mine.
2100976 2104855 Pity there is not more time...

2146480 2149733 You can have me.
I won't fight you.

2238822 2243410 You know, my daddy used to say,
''Every man's got a devil...
2243493 2245746 and you can't rest till you find him.''

2245871 2251627 Whatever happened back there
with you and your girlfriend,
I cleared that building.

2251710 2255088 Hell, nothin' in this town
happens without my say-so.

2255172 2258467 So I'm sorry if I spoiled
your wedding plans there, friend.
2258550 2261553 But if it's any consolation to you...
2261637 2264848 you have put a smile on my face.

2264932 2270145 You got a lot of spirit, son.
I am gonna miss you.

2270270 2274733 I have something to give you.
I don't want it any more.

2346388 2349558 - Everybody else dead?
- You helped me.
2350851 2353312 What you kept in here saved me.

2356565 2359818 I've been meaning to
come to church anyway.
2368327 2372414 I'm quitting as of now, if I live.
2381882 2384301 Stay with him until help comes.

2431932 2434935 - At least it stopped raining, huh?
- It can't rain all the time.

2435018 2439231 No, I don't believe it.
This nightmare your fault, Albrecht?

2439314 2442317 - Look, you go on home. I'm okay.
- Okay.

2442401 2445988 - You wanna tell me what's going on?
- Your vigilante's up on the roof.

2447990 2452202 - You missed it.
- Get him out of here.

2523774 2527027 If the people we love
are stolen from us...

2527110 2531740 the way to have them live on
is to never stop loving them.
2625209 2630631 Oh, it won't rain all the time
2688647 2693360 Is there something more to believe in
2898774 2904571 Falling farther from just what we are
2906573 2911245 Smoke a cigarette and lie some more

2945445 2950367 Time to wait too long
to wait too long
